card_text: 3 Level 4 monsters$NIf a "Mathmech" card(s) you control would be destroyed by card effect, you can detach 1 material from this card instead. If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can detach up to 3 materials from it, then choose that many effects (you cannot choose the same effect twice, and you resolve them in the listed order, skipping any that were not chosen);$N●Send 1 random card from your opponent's hand to the GY.$N●Send 1 monster your opponent controls to the GY.$N●Send 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls to the GY.$NYou can only use this effect of "Primathmech Laplacian" once per turn.
